subject: Football
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Three days after Ray Rice ran for a school-record 280 yards in the International Bowl, Rutgers said Tuesday that he would forgo his final year of eligibility to enter the 2008 N.F.L. draft.
snippet: Three days after Ray Rice ran for a school-record 280 yards in the International Bowl, Rutgers said Tuesday that he would forgo his final year of eligibility to enter the 2008 N.F.L. draft.
